verses.name: Daniel 10:4
verses.text: And in the four and twentieth day of the first month, as I was by the side of the great river, which is Hiddekel;

verses.name: Daniel 10:5
verses.text: Then I lifted up mine eyes, and looked, and behold a certain man clothed in linen, whose loins were girded with fine gold of Uphaz:

verses.name: Daniel 10:6
verses.text: His body also was like the beryl, and his face as the appearance of lightning, and his eyes as lamps of fire, and his arms and his feet like in colour to polished brass, and the voice of his words like the voice of a multitude.
